item.title: Visual Résumé
item.description: The code used to build this visual résumé was was created in R Markdown and is available at my Github site. If you would prefer a more traditional résumé (typeset in LaTeX), then I have that in Adobe PDF format as well. Work Experience Education and Professional Designations Technical Competencies References
